1. That, I am provisionally applying as Knight’s SOTA (Security Of Trained Associate) in Knight Detective & Security Services Pvt. Ltd.


2. That, I will deposit relevant documents within 30 days of registration with the company as advised.


3. That, I will login-logout during duty hours on Task Assigned in Knight’s SOTA App.


4. That, I can be posted to any place in India/Abroad any time for Security tasks.


5. That, my one month remunerations may be kept as refundable Security by the Company.


6. That, I will pay for cost of Uniform/Security kit & cost of training.


7. That, I will be giving one month notice in advance to the Company in writing/mail before I leave the duty.


8. That, I will follow LAW OF THE LAND, rules & regulations, code of conduct of the company & accept award as per the lawful disciplinary proceedings if any.


9. That, I will obtain clearance Certificate/NOC from the company before leaving.


10. That, for any dispute with the company, I undertake to get it arbitrated/resolved through the Board of Directors of the Company first. The jurisdiction shall be in Courts of Chandigarh India.


11. That, I have read, understood and accepted the above terms & conditions of Security Services.
